articles.title: South Africa's strained ties with US face new test - war games with China, Iran and Russia - BBC
articles.description: The naval exercises could inflame relations with Donald Trump - who is already at loggerheads with Pretoria.
articles.content:
Mayeni JonesAfrica correspondent, Johannesburg
The participation of warships from China, Iran and Russia in military exercises hosted by South Africa could further strain the country's relationship … [+9684 chars]
